comprehensive_overview: PETSc for Python (petsc4py) is a Python wrapper for the Portable, Extensible Toolkit for Scientific Computation (PETSc) library, an open-source suite of data structures and routines for the scalable (parallel) solution of scientific applications modeled by partial differential equations.
core_features: Integration of PETSc library within Python environment
Scalability for solving large-scale scientific and engineering problems
Support for various numerical algorithms and solvers
Access to PETSc data structures and functionalities
